message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. This is a great price considering its value to me. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer. I'm interested, but I'm only able to go up to $8,500 at this time. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $8,500 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,000, considering your interest. It's a fair price for both of us. What do you say?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price. However,  $10,000 is still a bit higher than I can afford right now. I'm willing to go up to $9,000. Let me know if you're interested in that.
